definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: There is some difference between W. P. A. and F. P. A.
sentences.chinese: “水漬險”與“平安險”是有些不同。

sentences.english: There are some bags of pepper with dry water stains in Hatch No. 5. Please put them aside for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 五艙有一些帶幹水漬的胡椒袋，暫時把它們放在那兒。

sentences.english: The coverage is W.P.A. plus Risk of Breakage。
sentences.chinese: 投保的險別爲水漬險加破碎險。

sentences.english: A W. P. A. or W. A. policy covers you against partial loss in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 水漬險在任何情形下都給保部門損失蹤險。

sentences.english: Insurance covers FPA and W. A. only if the Buyers require it to be added.
sentences.chinese: 假如買方要求加上保險，那麼只保平安險和水漬險。

sentences.english: Does a W. P. A. policy include a deck loading stipulation?
sentences.chinese: 水漬險是否包括甲板上裝貨的規定？

sentences.english: Please give us the policy rates for FPA coverage and for WPA coverage.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我們平安險和水漬險的保險費率。

sentences.english: Out insurance covers only W. P. A. including warehouse to warehouse clause valid for 15 days.
sentences.chinese: 我們只保水漬險，包括倉對倉條款有效期十五天。

sentences.english: Do you cover risk other than W. P. A. War Risk?
sentences.chinese: 除了水漬險和戰爭險外，你們還保其他險嗎？

sentences.english: Do you cover risks other than W. P. A. and War Risk?
sentences.chinese: 除了水漬險和戰爭險外，你們還保其它險嗎？

sentences.english: What is the difference between W. P. A and F. P. A?
sentences.chinese: 水漬險和平安險有什麼區別？

sentences.english: Then what is the difference between W. P. A. and F. P.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，“水漬險”與“安然險”有什麼區別呢？

sentences.english: This ink stain won't rub out.
This is the only difference bet ween W. P. A. and F. P. A.
sentences.chinese: 這是“水漬險”與“平方險”唯一不同之處。

sentences.english: I had moistened his temples, and had given him some water to drink.
sentences.chinese: 我用水漬溼了他的太陽穴，讓他喝了點水。

sentences.english: For the shipment in question, our clients request you to cover insurance against Risk of Breakage and WPA.
sentences.chinese: 對於這批貨，我們的客戶要求你方保破碎險和水漬險。
